DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 study will assess the mass balance recover of carbon-14 (14C) labelled ETC-1002 and the routes and rates of excretion of [14C]-ETC-1002
DOC.brief_title: Single Radiolabeled Dose Study to Investigate the Absorption, Metabolism and Excretion of [14C]-ETC-1002
DOC.criteria: Healthy Male Volunteers BMI 1035 kg/m2 Hx of CV, renal, hepatic, chronic respiratory or GI disease Hx of drug or alcohol abuse smoking within 12 mos of screening
